author: Emily Bass
title: How White House coronavirus coordinator Deborah Birx led the fight against global AIDS - Washington Post
description: How White House coronavirus coordinator Deborah Birx led the fight against global AIDS Washington Post Dr. Deborah Birx: Coronavirus data not matching extreme predictions Fox News White House identifies Chicago, Detroit areas as emerging coronavirus hot spots…
content: On Dec. 20, 2019, Deborah Birxs annual holiday party was in full swing, and Birx, in a baby-blue Christmas sweater with sequined snowflakes circling the heads of polar bears, would not stop restocking the bar. She stood at her white kitchen island, piling bot… [+25828 chars]
